commit.message:
re PR ada/71317 (Compiling gnat for rtems fails at s-taprop.adb)

	* s-osinte-kfreebsd-gnu.ads (clock_getres): Define.
	(Get_Page_Size): Remove duplicate and return int.

	PR ada/71317
	* s-osinte-rtems.ads (clock_getres): Define.
	(Get_Page_Size): Remove duplicate and return int.

From-SVN: r236938

files.patch:
@@ -1,3 +1,14 @@

+	(Get_Page_Size): Remove duplicate and return int.
